welcome_message_body: Welcome to Thunder Bay, where the stunning natural beauty of Lake Superior meets the charm of a vibrant city. Get ready to explore our outdoor adventures, rich history, and friendly community â€“ we hope you have a fantastic time discovering all that our city has to offer!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Thunder Bay Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
